name: HoldOn
description:
HoldOn is a rhythm based game for 1-4 players. You just have to JUMP to avoid the walls. But don't forget to HOOOOLD every input displayed on the screen. Remember that the sacrifices are your fingers...

Note : Controller Needed !
PS : More players => More fun !

Credits :

Steve Delgrange : Programmer
Valentin Lamérand - Game Artist
Bastien Lepesant - Programmer
